task_intent.title: 060-document-error-codes-and-troubleshooting-for-commo
task_intent.description: The codebase has 13 TODO/FIXME comments across critical files including webhooks.py, approval_chain_engine.py, and config_validator.py. Additionally, there's no centralized documentation for error codes, failure modes, or troubleshooting guides. Users encountering errors have no reference for resolution.
